params.name: feature_extractor
params.description: An instance of Wav2Vec2FeatureExtractor or SeamlessM4TFeatureExtractor. The feature extractor is a required input.

params.name: tokenizer
params.description: An instance of Wav2Vec2CTCTokenizer. The tokenizer is a required input.

params.name: decoder
params.description: An instance of pyctcdecode.BeamSearchDecoderCTC. The decoder is a required input.
